subject: Olympic Games
Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Kip Keino beat the favored Jim Ryun to win the Olympic 1,500 meters in 1968, becoming the first in a line of great Kenyan runners.
snippet: Kip Keino beat the favored Jim Ryun to win the Olympic 1,500 meters in 1968, becoming the first in a line of great Kenyan runners.
